name: validation-framework

scripts.postinstall: npm run install-yalc && npm run add-framework-locally
scripts.install-yalc: npm install -g yalc || echo 'Please install yalc globally using: npm install -g yalc'
scripts.add-framework-locally: npm run build && npm run publish-locally && yalc add validation-framework
scripts.update: npm run lint && npm run prettier-format && npm run build && npm run type-check && npm run publish-locally && npm run update-framework-locally
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && npx yalc remove validation-framework

description: A modular and extensible JavaScript validation framework
author: Anh-Nam-Nhan-Huy
